# iosxe_crypto (Resource)

This resource can manage the Crypto configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxe_crypto" "example" {
  engine_compliance_shield_disable = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `engine_compliance_shield_disable` (Boolean) Allow weak crypto to be configured

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxe_crypto.example ""
```
